description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 is now live in early access exclusively for Prime members, 12 hours before it commences for all users in India. It promises discounts across a wide range of categories including smartphones, tablets, laptops, TVs, Amazon devices, and other electronics. The first day of the sale has already brought some great deals. You can grab gadgets at highly discounted prices, in addition to other bank benefits and exchange offers. We’ve handpicked a selection of the top deals currently live.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 Goes Live for Prime Members: Best Offers on Mobile Phones, Electronics

description: Electronic Arts is laying off hundreds of workers and canceling a Titanfall game that was in development at its Respawn Entertainment subsidiary. Between 300 and 400 positions were eliminated, including around 100 at Star Wars Jedi developer Respawn, according to a person familiar with the cuts.
title: EA Lays Off Hundreds of Workers at Respawn and Other Studios, Cancels Titanfall Game

description: Google reportedly hinted that new Gemini features and capabilities will be unveiled at the Google I/O 2025. As per the report, the information was shared with Gemini Advanced subscribers in the April newsletter. The Mountain View-based tech giant teased a “more personalised assistant” and new productivity tools for users.
title: Google Teases New Gemini Features and a More Personalised Assistant Ahead of Google I/O 2025

description: iPhone 17 Air is said to be in the works as Apple's thinnest iPhone ever. The new iPhone model that is expected to replace the iPhone 16 Plus is likely to debut in September alongside the regular iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max. As we wait for the formal reveal, yet another iPhone 17 dummy video has leaked, showing the design. When compared side by side to other iPhone 17 models and the iPhone 16 Pro, the iPhone 17 Air does look thin. It appears to have a single camera on the back.
title: iPhone 17 Air Spotted in Leaked Hands-on Video, Appears to Be Slimmer Than the iPhone 16 Pro
Samsung Galaxy Book5 Series: Two AI Powers in One PC – Galaxy AI & Copilot+ PC

description: Samsung and GSMA have entered into a collaborative endeavour to improve connectivity on Samsung Galaxy-branded handsets. The phones running on Android 15 with One UI 7 skin on top will now come with VoLTE support by default. Currently, users are required to manually enable VoLTE connectivity on supported devices. VoLTE support for smartphones is said to improve both voice call quality as well as 4G and 5G network connectivity.
title: Samsung Partners With GSMA to Enable VoLTE by Default on Galaxy Phones With One UI 7

description: Global smartphone shipments recorded a slight year-on-year (YoY) growth of 0.2 percent for the January-March period (Q1) in 2025, according to a new report by market research firm Canalys. Markets including India, Latin America, marked notable declines in Q1, while China and the US recorded growth. Samsung secured top spot in the first quarter by grabbing 20 percent market share.
title: Samsung Retains Top Spot as Global Smartphone Shipments Grew 0.2 Percent YoY in Q1 2025: Canalys

description: Samsung is reportedly working on a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature that will show summaries of videos to users. As per the report, the feature is part of the South Korean tech giant’s One UI 8 operating system (OS), which is speculated to be released later this year. The OS will introduce the AI video summarisation tool that is said to offer a text summary of any online video.
title: Samsung's One UI 8 Update Will Reportedly Introduce an AI-Powered Video Summarisation Feature

description: Vivo T3 Ultra was unveiled in India in September 2024 with a MediaTek Dimensity 9200+ SoC and a 5,500mAh battery. At launch, the price of the handset started at Rs. 31,999 for the 8GB + 128GB option. The price was reduced by Rs. 2,000 in January this year. Now, the company has further reduced the price of the handset by another Rs. 2,000.
title: Vivo T3 Ultra Price in India Drops Again; Goes on Sale at This Price From May 1

description: Xiaomi released an open-source reasoning-focused artificial intelligence (AI) model on Tuesday. Dubbed MiMo, the family of reasoning models innovate the optimisation of reasoning capability in a relatively smaller parameter size. This is also the first open-source reasoning model by the tech giant, and it competes with Chinese models such as DeepSeek R1 and Alibaba’s Qwen QwQ-32B.
title: Xiaomi MiMo AI Models Launched With Efficient Reasoning, Small Size

description: A new plant making iPhones in southern India has started production and another will begin shipments in May, as Apple looks to boost manufacturing beyond its tariff-hit main manufacturing hub, China, sources said.
title: iPhone Production Said to Have Started at New Tata Plant, Foxconn Close Behind as Apple Looks to India

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 is expected to launch later this year. The existing clamshell foldable is powered by an octa-core Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset. The succeeding handset has previously been reported to come with a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC. There have been contradictory reports about the smartphone using an in-house Exynos 2500 chip. A new report reiterating the latter claim has surfaced online again.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Tipped to Launch in July With Exynos 2500 SoC

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 is all set to begin on May 1 at 12pm (noon) for all users in India. The online marketplace promises discounts on smartphones, accessories, laptops, Amazon devices, and other electronic items during the sale.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 Starts Tonight: All You Need to Know

description: Apple’s next-generation Watch SE models might get bigger. There’s new information claiming that they will sport bigger displays and that production for the same has already begun. However, there’s no confirmation whether Apple has chosen to go ahead with using plastic for its chassis yet.
title: Apple Watch SE to Be Refreshed With Bigger Displays, Larger Cases: Report

description: Nothing Phone 3a series was launched in India in March. Both the Nothing Phone 3a and the Phone 3a Pro models are promised to get three years of Android updates and six years of security upgrades. The company has released a software update for both phones in the lineup. It introduces the Privacy Space feature and support for 4K video recording on telephoto and periscope cameras.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Series Update Adds Privacy Space, Support for 4K Recording on Telephoto Cameras

description: Varunan is a Tamil action-drama movie that has been written and directed by Jayaamurugun. The movie revolves around the time when the rival distribution groups become violent and a threat to society, in order to keep up with the competition during the global water crisis. This movie is packed with supreme action sequences and keeps the viewers engaged until the end. Varunan is releasing on Aha Tamil on 1st May 2025.
title: Varunan OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Apple has launched a new page on its website to help users know more about actors, artists, creators, and athletes they love across devices. Dubbed Snapshot, it collates information from the Cupertino-based tech giant’s three media distribution platforms — Apple Music, Apple TV+, and Apple Podcasts. Pages on the website dedicated to each artist highlight their biography, content hub, and creations, such as films, music, and shows which are listed on various platforms.
title: Apple Launches Snapshot Page to Help Users Discover More About Their Favourite Artists and Athletes

description: Far Cry 4, the open-world first-person shooter from Ubisoft, has received an update a decade after its release that boosts the performance of the game on current-generation consoles. With the new patch, the game now runs at 60fps on PS5 and Xbox Series S/X.
title: Far Cry 4 Gets Free 60 FPS Patch on PS5 and Xbox Series S/X Ahead of Game Pass Launch

description: LG revealed its decision to exit the mobile phone market back in 2021. At the time, the South Korean brand promised its existing customers that it would continue delivering updates for eligible models over a three-year period. Now, LG is gearing up to shut down its smartphone update servers in just over two months. Post this, LG smartphones will no longer be able to install new Android OS updates.
title: LG Smartphone Update Servers to Be Permanently Shut Down on June 30

description: Criminal Justice: A Family Matter brings Madhav Mishra back into the courtroom as he handles a case where family ties clash with the law. Streaming soon on May 22, 2025 on the OTT platform, Jio Hotstar.
title: Criminal Justice Season 4 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Pankaj Tripathi-Starrer Legal Drama?

description: The first directed comedy specials of David, which feature him with just a mic and a live audience, are set to premiere on Prime Video on May 6, 2025. The executive producers are Alex Murray, John Irwin and Marc Gurvitz. This comic masterpiece has been produced under Amazon Studios and Irwin Entertainment.
title: David Spade: Dandelion OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch this Comedy Special Online?

description: Google Pixel 10 series is rumoured to be in development. A company official has now teased the upgrades related to the display technology the smartphone could debut with later this year. While the screens in the Pixel 9 series, including the new Pixel 9a, are said to be one of the best in the business, issues related to pulse width modulation (PWM) dimming rate have been widely known, something which the purported Pixel 10 has been promised to fix.
title: Google Pixel 10 Teased to Get PWM Dimming Rate Upgrades for Mitigating Headaches, Blurred Vision

description: Meta released a standalone app for its artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot, Meta AI, on Tuesday. The new Meta AI app is available on Android via Google Play and iOS via the App Store. The Menlo Park-based tech giant has added a social element to the app where users can see others' posts and images in a Discover feed.
title: Meta AI App With Voice Conversations, Social Discover Feed Launched

description: Experience the magic of Netflix’s Tudum 2025 live event on May 31, 2025! Celebrate your favourite stories with exclusive sneak peeks, trailer reveals, and superstar interactions — all for free, worldwide!
title: Netflix Tudum 2025: Everything You Need to Know About Star-Studded Global Fan Event

description: Nothing has released a new update for Essential Space, which is supported on the Nothing Phone 3a series and CMF Phone 2 Pro phones. The update is claimed to bring improvements to the existing features. Previously, the company updated the Essential Space with a Camera Capture capacity. Recent reports suggested that Nothing could soon bring a new subscription for access to select Essential Space features.
title: Nothing Updates Essential Space With Reminder Detail Page, Faster AI Responses

description: Directed by Taneli Mustonen and Brad Watson, The Bayou is an ultimate horrific thriller tale where a grad student, accompanied by her friends, escapes a plane crash. But she is not aware of the danger waiting for them to suffer. Watch this thriller story of survival only on Lionsgate Play, releasing on May 02, 2025.
title: The Bayou OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Meta is introducing a new technology called Private Processing for WhatsApp that will allow users to access artificial intelligence (AI) tools in a private and secure environment. On Tuesday, the Menlo Park-based tech giant shared a first look at the technology and how it is ensuring both data security as well as transparency at the user level.
title: WhatsApp Will Soon Offer Secure AI Access via Meta's Private Processing Technology

description: Motorola Edge 60 Pro was launched in India on Wednesday. The latest Edge series phone by Lenovo-owned smartphone maker comes with a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Extreme processor with up to 12GB RAM and 256GB storage. The Motorola Edge 60 Pro has a triple rear camera setup led by a 50-megapixel main sensor.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro With MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Extreme SoC, 6,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Amazon on Wednesday launched a refreshed version of the Kindle Paperwhite in India with new features. It now features a larger 7-inch e-ink screen which is said to deliver the highest contrast ratio of any Kindle to date. Powered by a dual-core processor, the all-new Kindle Paperwhite can offer up to 25 percent faster page turns without having a negative impact on the battery life.
title: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite With a 7-inch Screen, 16GB of Storage Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Honor might wait until October to unleash the Honor Magic 8 Pro as a successor to the current Magic 7 Pro, though leaks surrounding the phone are surfacing on the Web. The upcoming handset is said to use Qualcomm's next-generation Snapdragon flagship processor and is expected to pack a triple rear camera unit.
title: Honor Magic 8 Pro Tipped to Arrive With Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 SoC, Triple Rear Camera Setup

description: iPhone 17 series will likely come with support for more RAM than the existing iPhone 16 lineup. A tipster has claimed that the purported smartphones will support 12GB of RAM, that is an upgrade from the 8GB of RAM that the current models are equipped with. The tipster has hinted at memory improvements that the iPhone 18 lineup could arrive with as well.
title: iPhone 17 Series May Have 12GB RAM; iPhone 18 Lineup Tipped to Support Improved Memory

description: Honor 400 and Honor 400 Pro are rumoured to be in development. The purported phones have now been spotted on a Chinese certification website, hinting towards their imminent launch in China, as per a report. The listing also suggests the Honor 400 Pro potentially being equipped with a wired fast charging support of up to 90W.
title: Honor 400 Reportedly Gets 3C Certification in China Alongside Honor 400 Pro; Specifications Tipped
